name: Step Minding
description:
A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

You control a dice in this puzzle game. You have to move through the levels planning your moves ahead, counting the steps to take every corner. The upper face of the dice dictates the steps you take towards any direction. Be conscious of the orientation of the dice and be careful where you turn, and you'll get through it.

The game is short, but will keep being developed at a slow but steady pace. Any feedback is appreciated!
